metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11542 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
tcpdump 4.9.0 has a heap-based buffer over-read in the pimv1_print function in print-pim.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11542` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
